subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/momma_says_i'm_a_big_girl-no-mods.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Got this a little over an hour ago at the water trough. It is a little girl saying "momma says I'm a big girl". She sounds a little older than the girl tha said "I want my paw" from Monday in my yard. But could be the same girl that just sounded a little different today. Kinda neat......she is following me I guess :) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/momma_says_i%27m_a_big_girl-no-mods.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
